csw:Record.dc:title: EuroMapApp – Bathymetric integration and visualisation of European deep seafloor mapping results
csw:Record.dc:subject: /Physical Environment/Bathymetry/Digital Terrain Model

Seafloor mapping

Bathymetry

elevation
csw:Record.dct:abstract: The EuroMapApp task of the AtlantOS project aims to integrate Europe’s existing and future bathymetric data sets from the Atlantic Ocean into a seamless whole and put these results into a widely accessible format allowing immediate visualization of the seafloor for the specialist and non-specialist user alike. The partner institutions are GEOMAR, Ifremer, NIOZ, and NERC-BODC.

The partner institutions are GEOMAR, Ifremer, NIOZ, and NERC-BODC.
